overview: The classic one-hour video documentary "Are We Alone?", based on Zecharia's book Genesis Revisited, is now available in this re-edited version. It is the only documentary recording the historic on-camera interview by Zecharia with Dr. Robert Harrington of the United States Naval Observatory, and original footage from the Soviet Union about the mysterious loss of the Phobos 2 spacecraft.
title: Are We Alone
